record.Title: Harriman Fiord, Prince William Sound, Alaska, 1899.
record.Notes: From album entitled: A Souvenir of the Harriman Alaska Expedition, May - August, 1899. Volume 1, New York to Cook Inlet, frontispiece. Caption on image: Head of Harriman Fiord, Prince William Sound Photograph taken by Edward S. Curtis, official photographer, member of the 1899 Harriman Alaska Expedition.
record.SubjectsLCSH: Harriman Alaska Expedition (1899); Harriman Fiord (Alaska); Prince William Sound (Alaska)
record.OrderingInformation: To order a reproduction, inquire about permissions, or for information about prices see: http://www.lib.washington.edu/specialcollections/services/reproduction/reproduction Please cite the Order Number
record.CitationInformation: University of Washington Libraries, Special Collections, [Order Number or Negative Number]
record.Repository: University of Washington Libraries, Special Collections
record.RepositoryCollection: Harriman Alaska Expedition Collection. PH Coll 333
record.DigitalReproductionInformation: Scanned from a photographic print using a Microtek Scanmaker 9600XL at 72 dpi in JPEG format at compression rate 3. 11/1998.
record.Contributor: University of Washington Libraries. Special Collections Division
record.Restrictions: For information on permissions for use and reproductions please visit UW Libraries Special Collections Use Permissions page: http://www.lib.washington.edu/specialcollections/services/permission-for-use

record.Title: Lowe Inlet, British Columbia, Canada, June 1899.
record.Notes: From album entitled: A Souvenir of the Harriman Alaska Expedition, May - August, 1899. Volume 1, New York to Cook Inlet, leaf 11. Caption on image: Lowe Inlet Inside Passage to Alaska Photograph taken by Edward S. Curtis, official photographer, member of the 1899 Harriman Alaska Expedition.
record.SubjectsLCSH: Harriman Alaska Expedition (1899); Lowe Inlet (B.C.); Inlets--British Columbia

record.Title: Columbia River fishwheel, May 1899.
record.Notes: From album entitled: A Souvenir of the Harriman Alaska Expedition, May - August, 1899. Volume 1, New York to Cook Inlet, leaf 9. Caption on image: A Columbia River fish-wheel Photograph taken by Leon J. Cole, taxidermist, member of the 1899 Harriman Alaska Expedition.
record.SubjectsLCSH: Harriman Alaska Expedition (1899); Columbia River; Fishwheels--Columbia River; Fisheries--Equipment and supplies--Columbia River

record.Title: Snake River below Shoshone Falls, Idaho, May 1899.
record.Notes: From album entitled: A Souvenir of the Harriman Alaska Expedition, May - August, 1899. Volume 1, New York to Cook Inlet, leaf 7. Caption on image: Canyon of Snake River below Shoshone Falls Snake River Canyon is commonly called Hell's Canyon. Photograph taken by Grove Karl Gilbert, Geologist, U.S. Geological Survey, member of the 1899 Harriman Alaska Expedition.
record.SubjectsLCSH: Harriman Alaska Expedition (1899); Hells Canyon (Idaho and Or.); Snake River, South Fork (Idaho)
